alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:01AM PST until January 06 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow continued above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 12 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties, including Darrington, Index, Skykomish, Stevens Pass, and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow could change to freezing rain in the passes at times this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
